Talk_43:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00>That voe... He's wearing almost nothing.


Running around outdoors with barely any
clothing on... <sp:5:0:0>That's just not right. He'd
make a terrible partner for me.
Talk_3011:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:SurpriseS>Huh? Hang on! The voe is talking to
us again!

Come on, Pasha, Dina! Remember
your training!
Talk_44:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>What's this deal with this voe and not
wearing clothes?

We've been away from Gerudo Town long
enough that I thought I was used to voe,
but I wasn't ready for this one...
Talk_45:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>Dina says it's too soon for us to see a voe
with so little on, so I looked away as fast
as I could, but...
Well, I am a little curious.
Talk_46:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:Notice>You're so much shorter than the others...<sp:5:1:0>


You're Yiga Clan, aren't you?


I... I guess I'll just pretend I didn't
see you.
Talk_47:
<sp:3:0:2:0900>We have nothing to say to you
Yiga Clan jerks!

Just seeing you around here is upsetting!
Why don't you go back to your hideout in
Karusa Valley!
Talk_48:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>Tsk...<sp:5:0:0> That evil mask... I'd take you down
right here and now, but I have more
important things to do.
I can't risk missing the voe of my dreams
just because some Yiga Clan fool
is around...
Talk_21:
<clr:0200><sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:SurpriseM>Ack, a voe! OK, it's time to put the skills I learned
in "Voe and You" to the test!<sp:0:2:2:6400><clr:ffff>
Talk_22: <sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:Notice><clr:0200>Ah! A voe! A voe right there!<clr:ffff><sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk_23:
<clr:0200><sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:SurpriseM_01>Ah! Um... Er...let's see, when a voe talks to you...
Compliment him! Is that right? I think it is...<sp:0:2:2:6400><clr:ffff>
Talk_24:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughS>Listen well, young voe! I cook a mean
creamy heart soup!

It calls for some fresh milk, one voltfruit,
one hydromelon...and two <clr:0000>heart-shaped
vegetables<clr:ffff>!
It's a very advanced dish, if I do say
so myself.

<snd:Chat_01>What do you have to say to that?
It sounds like quite a delicious meal,
doesn't it?
...<sp:5:1:0>


<clr:0200><sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:3:0:2:0c01>No reaction? That's weird... I thought a fine meal
was certain to get the attention of any voe...<sp:0:2:2:6400><clr:ffff>
Talk_25:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Happy_00>Uh...<sp:5:0:0>um...<sp:5:0:0> My name is Risa.


I really like the <clr:0000>meaty rice balls <clr:ffff>my vaba
makes by combining Hylian rice with
some meat...
And...and...everyone tells me I'd win first
place in a silly goose competition!

...<sp:5:1:0>


<clr:0200><sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:3:0:2:0c01>Wait...huh? No reaction? That's weird... Maybe I
should have gone with "scatterbrain tournament"?<sp:0:2:2:6400><clr:ffff>
Talk_26:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Happy>H-hey you! You're so short! And cute!


...<sp:5:1:0>


<sp:3:0:2:0c01><sp:0:2:2:5000><clr:0200>Huh? That doesn't seem to have done anything.
Compliments are hard...<clr:ffff><sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk_28:
<clr:0200><sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:SurpriseS>Ack, he's back! OK, time to break out those skills
I learned in "Voe and You" again!<sp:0:2:2:6400><clr:ffff>
Talk_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0300><snd:Think_01>We finally managed to leave Gerudo Town
and set off on our search for voe...

I wanted to put all our "Voe and You"
lessons to the test, but none of the voe
we've met have measured up...
Talk_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:TalkPositive_01>Oh, that reminds me! Before we left, I
heard someone talking about a voe in the
outside world. They called him a "hero."
Talk_03:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy_00>A hero, huh... I bet he's a strong voe
who's taller than us, even!

<sp:3:0:2:0701>OK! I'm going to take him out!
Talk_32:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:SurpriseS_00>It's a voe!<sp:5:0:0> And... Is that a sword he's
carrying?<sp:5:0:0> It certainly looks like one...
Talk_3000:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:LaughS_01>We're finally getting to truly search for
voe! Where should we go first?
Talk_04:
<sp:3:0:2:0300><snd:Sad_00>You mean "ask him out," right? Our class
did cover how to be the one to make
the first move...
<sp:3:0:2:0c01>Anyway, I'm sure it's possible to pursue
the hero, but...<sp:5:0:0> How would we even
recognize him?
<sp:3:0:2:0400><snd:Notice_00>Oh! The legendary sword! Now I
remember. The hero is carrying the
legendary sword.
Talk_3001:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Chat_01>Hmm... I'd like to go after an intellectual,
so I want to head toward Necluda.

I think I'll find what I'm looking for in
<clr:0000>Kakariko Village<clr:ffff>,<clr:0000> <clr:ffff>where the Sheikah live.
Talk_05:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:Think_00>OK, the legendary sword. Wait, what is
the legendary sword, anyway?

If it's good enough to be called legendary,
then it probably...glows?<sp:5:1:0> Or something?
Talk_34:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Think_01>But that sword isn't glowing at all! And it
isn't nearly as tall as even one of us...
Talk_3002:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy_00>We could head to Faron in the southeast?
I heard there's a rare, <clr:0000>newly discovered
animal <clr:ffff>there!
Talk_06:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:Think_01>Ugh, this sounds like a real pain. It'd be
easier to just launch a surprise attack.

If we were really careful, we could easily
sneak up on the target...
Talk_3003:
<sp:3:0:2:0a01><snd:Tired_01>...What does that have to do with
finding voe?
Talk_07:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:Tired_01>Risa... You have to stop referring to
voe as "targets."
Talk_36:
<sp:3:0:2:0400><snd:SurpriseM_01>N-no! Risa! Remember our lessons!
Brute force isn't the answer!
Talk_3004:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:SurpriseS_00>Huh? Hey! Is there really a voe talking to
us right now?

Pasha! Dina! Now's our chance to put our
lessons to the test!
Talk_08:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughS_01>Oh! Maybe it's really tall! Taller than
us, even if we were standing on each
other's shoulders!
Talk_37:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:LaughS_01>Anyway, there's no way such a short voe
is the hero we heard about.

Let's keep looking.
Talk_3005:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:SurpriseM>OK! OK! Let's see!<sp:5:0:0> I just need to...<sp:5:0:0> Right!
I'll wave to him, you keep an eye out for
bandit ambushes!
Talk_09:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:TalkPositive_00>I heard someone saying it'd been lost in
the woods to the north. Or did they say,
"<clr:0000>Lost Woods<clr:ffff>"?<sp:5:1:0> It had to do with woods.
<sp:3:0:2:0401>Oh! Maybe it attracts bugs that
love trees!
Talk_38:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Think_01>But that sword isn't glowing at all! And I
don't see a single tree-loving bug...
Talk_3006:
<sp:3:0:2:0900><snd:Angry>Wave with both hands! Both hands!
He won't feel safe if he can't tell both
your hands are empty!
Talk_3007:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy_00>It's all about food with voe! I bet he's
hungry after his travels!

I'm sure he'd love to go and hunt for that
<clr:0000>newly discovered animal <clr:ffff>in <clr:0000>Faron<clr:ffff>!
Talk_40:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:SurpriseS_00>A voe! <sp:5:0:0>And he's... He's not wearing much
at all!
Talk_3008:
<sp:3:0:2:0900><snd:Work>What kind of silly suggestion is that?!


The Faron region is so far from here,
off in the southeast of Hyrule! That whole
subtropical area!
Why would your mind jump straight to
a faraway place?
Talk_41:
<sp:3:0:2:0400><snd:SurpriseS_01>We didn't prepare for this! Keep your
backs turned! Don't look directly at
the voe!
Talk_3009:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:Ease>And more importantly, I don't think
sending the voe away is the
right approach...
Talk_42:
<sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:3:0:2:0c00>I'm kind of curious, but I don't want to get caught
peeking if someone else is peeking too...<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk_3010:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting_01>That reminds meâ€”I heard that there's a
new town to the northeast in Akkala
called <clr:0000>Tarrey Town<clr:ffff>.
Apparently there's a Gerudo working for
a construction company there. Maybe we
could use that town as a home base?
